text: Granada Hills, Los Angeles is a neighborhood of Los Angeles, California in the San Fernando Valley. It is at the foothills of the Santa Susana Mountains. This is north of the North Hills, Northridge, west of Mission Hills and Sylmar, and east of the Porter Ranch neighborhoods. ==References== ==Other websites== * Map of Los Angeles neighborhoods * Granada Hills Chamber of Commerce Category:Neighborhoods of Los Angeles
title: Granada Hills, Los Angeles
